meanings.definition: A line on a map connecting points of equal value.
meanings.sent1: The isopleths on the map show areas with the same temperature.
meanings.sent2: Cartographers use isopleths to represent elevation changes.
meanings.sent3: The isopleths on the map decided to throw a party at the equator.
meanings.sent4: The isopleths danced across the map, connecting mountains and valleys.
meanings.sent5: The isopleths painted a colorful picture of the landscape on the map.

meanings.sent3: The isopleths gathered for a meeting to discuss their differences.
